sentences.sContent: She was wearing a uniform jacket and skirt, and I realized that she was streetcar conductor.
sentences.sContent_eng: She was wearing a uniform jacket and skirt, and I realized that she was streetcar conductor.
sentences.sCn: 她穿着制服上衣和裙子，我明白她原来是有轨电车检票员。

sentences.sContent: She was scrupulously clean, she showered every morning, and I liked the smell of perfume, fresh perspiration, and streetcar that she brought with her from work.
sentences.sContent_eng: She was scrupulously clean, she showered every morning, and I liked the smell of perfume, fresh perspiration, and streetcar that she brought with her from work.
sentences.sCn: 她有洁癖，每天早晨都洗澡，我喜欢香水味道，还有她从有轨电车带回来的清爽的汗水味道。

sentences.sContent: Life in those areas, roughly paralleling the historic St. Charles Avenue streetcar line, has bounced back to normal.
sentences.sContent_eng: Life in those areas, roughly paralleling the historic St. Charles Avenue streetcar line, has bounced back to normal.
sentences.sCn: 大体上，在靠近闻名遐迩的圣查尔斯大街有轨电车线附近的那些地区，生活已恢复到了正常水平。

trans.tranOther: a type of bus that runs on electricity along metal tracks in the road
